== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
variable:
  description: a variable
  multi: true
  default:
    jinja: |
      {{test_information }}
    params:
      test_information:
        type: information
        information: test_information
    description: get information test_information
----
